name: PIXELS: Digital Creatures
description:
PIXELS has been built from the ground up to deliver a unique fusion of Strategic Turn-Based Combat, the replayability of a Roguelike, all combined with the addictiveness of Creature Collectors! Every feature has been deeply thought about to bring a fresh and unique take on roguelikes. Pick your starter to begin your journey through the Virtual World. Who knows what awaits you?

A DIVERSE CAST OF PIXELS


Experience fighting with or against a wide variety of different Pixels, each with their own moves, strengths, and weaknesses. With expressive personalities and powerful moves, we hope you'll find your favorite!

GO THROUGH THE PORTAL!


Traverse your way through the hexagon map of the Virtual World. Every stop offers many posibilities, from sleepy towns, challenging battles, random loot, and other secrets. There's only one rule, keep moving forward!

A NEW EXPERIENCE EVERYTIME


The virtual world of PIXELS is always changing. On every journey, new paths may appear or old paths may vanish. Mystery spaces will keep you guessing. Encounter different Pixels to recruit and most battles are randomly generated so you never know what's around the corner!

TACTICAL TURN-BASED COMBAT


Bored with just spamming your most powerful move to destroy foes? Experience the innovative COST System. With COST, battles demand focus and planning to defeat your foe. If you can achieve victory, moves refill after battle so you're ready for the next one!

STEWARDS TO CHALLENGE


On your journey to break free from the Virtual World, fight your way through multiple cities. Each one consists of an Arena and its Steward...the best of the best. Work your way up from the Bronze Arena, all the way up to the famed Ace Arena! (3 out of 8 total Arenas are currently avaliable)

THE H.U.B. AWAITS YOUR RETURN!


Were you defeated? The Home User Base welcomes your return! Discover Pixels to fill out your Pixel Database! Spend your shards on permanent upgrades to power up future runs! No player has ever reached the end. The rumor is that its impossible. Can you prove them wrong?
